item.description:
ExCollege Faculty-Student Trivia Challenge 2011 featuring...Quizmaster Bob of PJ Ryans in Teele Square

Monday, May 2 8:00PM Hotung

I would like to form one or two teams of six faculty and/or staff to enter the trivia challenge.  Former colleagues and friends are welcome to join us too.

The guest host this year is a veteran trivia night emcee, and the host of an extremely popular weekly contest at a bar in Teele Square. The questions are sure to be challenging and interesting, and will cover all disciplines.

Prizes will be awarded to:
Top undergraduate team
Top faculty/staff/administration/graduate team
Overall 1st place finisher
This will be a fun way to relax with students and colleagues at the end of a busy year.

I very much hope to see you on the 2nd!
item.how_to_find_us: Faculty-Staff Social Group Meet-up Signs on tables.
item.why: Let's show our students what's what.
item.name: ExCollege Faculty & Staff vs. Student Trivia Challenge 2011
